overview: Aidan Cullen is a finance executive who has over 27 years of Finance and Administration experience at both private and public companies. Prior to joining Gigamon, Aidan served as Chief Financial Officer for Sylantro Systems, where he helped build the business model and infrastructure to scale with operational effectiveness in delivering results, and oversaw Sylantroâ€™s merger with Broadsoft, as well as management of IT, Sales Operations, Finance and Administration for the company. He also served as the CFO at Tasman Networks, where he oversaw Tasman’s merger with Nortel Networks, and as CFO for Monterey Design Systems. Aidan’s international experience includes serving in senior finance positions at high tech companies including Digital Equipment Corp., JTS Corporation and Mentor Graphics, both in Europe, Asia Pacific and in the United States. Aidan earned his MBA from Northeastern University.
